summary: Completed mobile-first testing of Ramadan calendar app. Calendar features mostly working with mobile-optimized design. Shopping list bulk add functionality working perfectly. Navigation overlay issue blocking some menu items.

ui_bugs.issue: Made with Emergent badge blocks navigation clicks to recipes and settings
ui_bugs.symptoms: Users cannot access recipes and settings pages due to overlay interception

integration_issues.issue: Events added during session don't persist - events disappear after navigation
integration_issues.symptoms: Events show briefly after creation but vanish after page refresh or navigation

passed_tests: Calendar month view with German translation loads correctly
Calendar legend shows color-coded event types (Besuch green, Einladung gold)
Week view displays compact horizontal date strip and vertical agenda
Add event dialog opens and accepts input correctly
Shopping list bulk add functionality works - multiple items per textarea
Quantity parsing in parentheses works (e.g. Ã„pfel 2kg)
Shopping list categories display with icons and counters
Item checkboxes and delete buttons functional
Mobile navigation bar visible and core navigation (dashboard, calendar, shopping) works
Mobile viewport (412x915) displays properly with responsive design

critical: Fix navigation overlay issue - Made with Emergent badge blocks recipes/settings navigation clicks
Investigate calendar event persistence - events disappear after navigation/refresh
medium: Verify calendar color differentiation between Besuch (green) and Einladung (gold) events once persistence is fixed
